name: MatchM
description:
A simple game, where there are several "islands" of tiles. Each island contains the same tiles, in different locations. 
Each tile has a Pattern, a Colour and a Border. The aim is to match the components across all of the islands.
You can match any number of components (i.e you can just match the colour), however, that may mean you run out of available options!

Playable in VR or standard.

VR Controls (tested on an Index):

Trigger - select / action

B - Pause

Standard using Mouse:
LMB - selection / action

P - Pause
